attributes.action: House of commons speaker John Bercow to be sacked or resign
attributes.background: John Bercow has no right to be having “ his say” over Brexit in the house of commons . This man is a remain supporter and is using his position as speaker to try and persuade others to support this The speaker of the house of commons is supposed to remain impartial to any debates no matter his views

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP, including the Speaker, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
